import axios from 'axios'; import React, { useState } from 'react' function Create() { const [values, setValues ] = useState({ name: '', price: '', description: '', type: '', image: '', }) const handleSubmit =(e) => { e.preventDefault(); axios.post('http://localhost:8081/product') } return (

) } export default Create;
